name: @freesewing/jaeger
description: Freesewing pattern for a sport coat style jacket with two buttons and patch pockets
author: Joost De Cock <joost@decock.org> (https://github.com/joostdecock)

scripts.patch: npm version patch -m ':bookmark: v%s' && npm run build
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m ':bookmark: v%s' && npm run build
scripts.major: npm version major -m ':bookmark: v%s' && npm run build
scripts.watch: nodemon -w src -w config --exec 'rollup -c rollup.js -o dist/browser.js -f iife -m true -n freesewing_patterns_jaeger --footer "freesewing.patterns.jaeger = freesewing_patterns_jaeger;"'
scripts.browserbuild: rollup -c rollup.js -o dist/browser.js -f iife -m true -n freesewing_patterns_jaeger --footer 'freesewing.patterns.jaeger = freesewing_patterns_jaeger;'
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run browserbuild && npm run nodebuild && npm run modulebuild
